## Asset Type
<!-- Icon, screenshot, feature graphic, etc -->

## Specs
- Dimensions (px)
- Format (PNG/JPG)
- Commit path: `/assets/store/`

## Definition of Done
- [ ] Asset exported at required resolutions
- [ ] Stored in `/assets/store/`
- [ ] Referenced in store console setup
